output_list.reason: The mint function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The unfreeze function has an access control flaw where the owner can decide the fate of the balance of an arbitrary user.
The transfer function has an integer overflow where the balance of the owner is subtracted by the balance of the user.
The transferFrom function has an access control flaw where the owner can decide the fate of the balance of an arbitrary user.
The approve function has an access control flaw where the owner can decide the fate of the balance of an arbitrary user.
The burn function has an integer overflow where the owner can decide the balance of the user to be burned.
